Articles.Content:
I'm not sure if I'm doing some thing wrong or if I've actually managed to break the game.

I can't seem to set a control node. I landed on Minmus and then I took a break and turned off the game. Today when I went back to that mission it's like there is an old control node target stuck on my ball and I can't set any new nodes. There are no markers where I can open and remove the old node. I'm trying to redock with my lab but with out the ability to set a control node and predict an intercept I don't know how I'm going to get back. And the game is saved so I really need to get poor Jeb and the rest of his crew back home.

What am I doing wrong?

Lee

Never mind scratch this. I closed and reopened this mission once I was in orbit. Now with velocity that pesky old control node shows up and I can delete it and set new ones.

This might constitute a glitch. At the very least it was driving me insane. They might add it to the "to be fixed list."

Lee
Yeah, I have had that issue as well and fixed it the way you fixed it.
